bibl.title: Kings beyond the claustra: Nero's Nubian Nile, India and the rubrum mare (Tacitus, Annals 2.61).

bibl.title: Amici - socii - clientes? Abhängige Herrschaft im Imperium Romanum

bibl.seg: David Braund, Kings beyond the claustra: Nero's Nubian Nile, India and the rubrum mare (Tacitus, Annals 2.61).
Ernst Baltrusch & Julia Wilker (edd.), Amici - socii - clientes? Abhängige Herrschaft im Imperium Romanum = Berlin Studies of the Ancient World. 31 (Berlin, 2015) pp. 123-159, 1 fig.

1. Introduction. - 2. Generalization and the hazards of succession: Roman emperors and Parthian royals. - 3. From Germanicus at the claustra to Nero's Nubian Nile. - 4. Augustan initiatives. - 5. Conclusion. - Avec résumés en anglais et en allemand.
